boardgame.name: Call of Cthulhu: Collectible Card Game
La llamada de Cthulhu JCC
boardgame.description: From FFG's Chris:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Cthulhu genre is among the most recognized and well-regarded in the gaming hobby, and we hope to provide a fast, clever, and horrific collectible card game in this juicy setting, complete with 1920_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s paranormal investigations, jaded detectives, mad cultists, and horrors from beyond the stars._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;From the press release:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The CALL OF CTHULHU CCG will have no relation or compatibility to the Mythos Collectible Card Game published by Chaosium, Inc in the late 1990_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s. Fantasy Flight_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s CALL OF CTHULHU CCG will present new and innovative game play which will be simply, fast, and yet provide a deep and dynamic experience for players. The CALL OF CTHULHU CCG will seek to inspire the wonderful flavor of the Cthulhu genre, such as the flavorful _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;pulp_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; 1930_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s environment, arcane tomes and secrets, paranormal investigations, the elder gods and their terrible servants, dark sinister plots, inhuman conspiracies, and dangers from beyond the stars._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Reimplemented by: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Call of Cthulhu: The Card Game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Online Play_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; OCTGN _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: All our games are brand new in shrink wrap. Buyer pays for shipping. Shipping will depend on your location and the weight of game. We will discount shipping on multiple games orders whenever possible to ensure the fairest rate. We are not responsible for lost mail but will insure shipment, at your request. Items are shipped within one business day of receiving payment. Payment must be recieved within 7 days after the day you agreed to buy the item, and all PayPal or credit card payments must be made within this time period. If payment isn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t received within these time periods, all orders will be revoked and proper feedback will be left. Unopened merchandise may be returned within 14 days of purchase for a full refund, less original shipping charges. Return shipping charges are the responsibility of the customer with the exception of defective merchandise. To return an item, please contact us prior to sending an item back to us. WA orders pay 8.5% sales tax. Please email us with any questions. Thanks Chum Chum Games chumchumgames@yahoo.com
Opened but never used Premium Edition Starters - 1 Arkham and 1 Eldritch Edition. Price is for each starter. I will accept Direct Deposit from Australian Buyers.

This entry is here for: User: locusshifter Items: Call of Cthulhu CCG - Asylum Pack III: Conspiracies of Chaos - $15 Call of Cthulhu CCG - Asylum Pack IV: Dunwich Denizens - $15 It is for the purpose of finalizing the auction listed here: http://www.boardgamegeek.com/geeklist/42800/item/948876 Once this is accepted, we_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll get a total including shipping sent to you. Please note that I am out June 10th (Wed) - 14th (Sun) and will be out of contact. Hopefully we can get these all shipped before then otherwise it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll be a week.

This collection includes the starter box for the LCG card game, 1500 non-rare cards, 110 rares, and the promotional Cthulhu and Cthulhu for President cards.
